backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types and maps for reports, contact lookup, provider config, user profiles, and access control, plus user profile getters/setters with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels for internationalization, language selector, and footer updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose, features, and integration details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading the React app and PWA metadata.
frontend/LIVE_INTEGRATION_RESTART_RUNBOO: Runbook outlining steps to restart and verify a clean production integration workflow after an interruption.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming no frontend changes are required for the Phase 3a read‑only database canister.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Comprehensive checklist for verifying production builds, covering routing, consent gate, branding, analysis behavior, and PWA requirements.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes to the app shell.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static lookup table with public phone and email metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, theme, metadata, and app behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching and network-first caching for offline support.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Step‑by‑step guide for testing WebAPK installation behavior on Android Chrome.
frontend/scripts/live-integration-comple: Wrapper that runs the restart script and outputs a single success message when integration completes.
frontend/scripts/restart-live-integratio: Build workflow script handling cleanup, dependency checks, builds, and success output for live integration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, layout, PWA setup, consent gate, and page rendering.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definition exposing the analyzeText backend service function.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component performing contact-type detection, public info lookup, antifraud analysis, caching, and backend queries.
UI card showing risk analysis, scores, public info, offline indicators, and report submission options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, mobile menu, and footer, integrated with routing and i18n.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Authentication control showing login or profile menu based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, and errors or empty states.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring acceptance of cookies and terms before proceeding, with navigation to legal pages.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, ICP reference, data sources, and cybersecurity links using i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button triggering PWA install flow and alerting if installation is not eligible.
frontend/src/components/InternationalCon: Renders detailed international contact risk information including scores, country, and trust data.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language selection dropdown allowing users to switch app language via i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small button to initiate PWA installation using shared install helper.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting lookup reports with category selection, optional description, anonymity notice, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud analysis results including risk level, explanation, recommendation, sources, and collaborative basis.
Shows authenticated user info, lookup history with clearing support, and a logout button.
frontend/src/config/features.ts: Defines feature-flag configuration and helpers for toggling PRO, external provider, and advanced scoring features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Manages localStorage-backed cache for advanced contact lookup results with add, get, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes main, extra, and reports canister actors tied to identity and logs a readiness report once.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Handles persisted user-consent state with versioning and provides accept functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternationalConta: Performs international contact lookups via the backend actor and exposes loading, error, and reset state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom options and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status and returns simple flags. Adds event listeners for connectivity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for PWA installation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPromptCo: Empty placeholder hook file for managing cooldown before showing PWA install prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLookupReport: Submits hybrid anonymous/authenticated contact reports to the backend and manages loading, success, and localized error state. Maps contact type to backend enum and exposes a reset function.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and saves per-identity user history in local storage and exposes add/clear functions. Syncs history when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state and translation context with Portuguese fallback merging. Persists the chosen language in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation dictionaries, exposing Portuguese as the base type. Contains app UI strings for multiple locales.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates IC actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using a shared HTTP agent pointing to ic0.app. Exposes helper functions to instantiate each actor type.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Stores canonical canister IDs and provides a lookup function by canister type. Centralizes IDs for main, extra, and reports canisters.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for the extra canister with phone and crypto report queries. Exports TypeScript interface for typed actor usage.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines the main canister Candid interface for text analysis. Exports a typed interface with a single analyzeText method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid types and service methods for submitting and querying reports across multiple categories. Exports TypeScript interfaces for all report structures and actor methods.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates a readiness report indicating canister availability and method presence, and provides a logger for debugging environment status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining extensive light/dark theme CSS variables, global styles, accessibility enhancements, and mobile touch-target adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering the App with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Documentation page with SEO setup that displays content sections and triggers PDF generation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage offering message, email, phone, and crypto fraud analysis with tabbed inputs and result rendering.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains verification methods and scoring through accordion sections with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty file placeholder for the institutional mission page.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the institutional page.
frontend/src/pages/InternationalContactS: Page enabling validated international contact lookup with backend queries and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Mission page rendering translated vision, core mission, social impact, and values sections with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page using translated content, dynamic SEO, and multiple structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the terms and conditions page with translated text, SEO setup, and sectioned content blocks.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Handles deferred PWA install prompt events and provides a trigger function to request installation.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal client-side router with shared state, navigation events, and a navigate helper.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Provides text normalization and keyword/phrase matching utilities for antifraud heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Detects, normalizes, and validates phone or email input using basic heuristics and multilingual error messages.
Builds a structured documentation object using Portuguese translations for institutional and product content.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Analyzes email strings for scam indicators using deterministic pattern checks.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates and downloads a text-based documentation file assembled from structured content.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskPhrases.ts: Defines high‑ and medium‑risk phrase patterns with categories and weights for fraud detection, supporting multilingual fragment matching.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a client‑side cooldown using localStorage to limit how often fraud reports can be submitted.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Provides a heuristic text analyzer that scores messages for scam indicators, crypto patterns, URLs, and formatting anomalies.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads and queries a same‑origin JSON dataset for public contact information keyed by phone or email.
frontend/src/utils/publicSourceProviders: Aggregates public‑source checks using local lookup data and placeholder logic for future external providers.
frontend/src/utils/riskScoring.ts: Computes a 0–100 fraud risk score from weighted factors and maps numeric scores to Low/Medium/High levels.
frontend/src/utils/riskWeights.ts: Defines configurable default weights and thresholds used by the risk‑scoring engine.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates document title and meta description to maintain consistent site SEO branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Implements a structured, multilingual fraud‑analysis engine combining keyword patterns, scoring, and templated explanations.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Translates backend Portuguese analysis text into other languages using a dictionary‑based replacement system.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages per‑principal user profiles in localStorage, storing history items and optional language preferences.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom theme tokens.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s UI-only requirements, i18n expansion plan, footer update goals, constraints, and known issues for build planning.
